key_0.name: Grateful Dead
key_0.set1: 1974 "Mars Hotel" Rehearsals 1. Pride Of Cucamonga #1 > Pride Of Cucamonga #2 6:40 2. Money Money 5:41 3.Unbroken Chain #1 > Unbroken Chain #2 8:03 4. Unbroken Chain (acoustic) 6:19 Phil Teaching the Band! 1974 "Mars Hotel" Demos ; All Instrumental 5. Unbroken Chain 6:46 6. Scarlet Begonias 8:45 7. Pride Of Cucamonga 5:00 8. Ship Of Fools 4:25 9. Money Money 7:54 10. Loose Lucy 6:21 Total Time 65:59

key_2.name: Grateful Dead
key_2.set1: U.S. Blues, Beat It On Down The Line, Brown Eyed Women, Mexicali Blues, It Must Have Been The Roses, Black Throated Wind, They Love Each Other, Big River, Loose Lucy, El Paso, Row Jimmy, Playin' In The Band
key_2.set2: Tennessee Jed, Me & My Uncle, Ship of Fools, The Race is On, China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider, Truckin'-> Nobody's Fault But Mine-> Goin' Down The Road Feelin' Bad
key_2.set3: Mississippi Half Step, Promised Land, Brokedown Palace, Jack Straw, Eyes Of The World -> China Doll -> Wharf Rat -> Sugar Magnolia, E: Uncle John's Band
key_2.comment: Reported Soundcheck before this show, which may also circulate, possibly misdated, as 2/24/74: Let It Grow, They Love Each Other, U. S. Blues #1 -> U. S. Blues #2, Attics Of My Life, It Must Have Been The Roses -> Jam

key_3.name: Grateful Dead
key_3.set1: Around & Around, Dire Wolf, Me And Bobby McGee, Sugaree, Mexicali Blues, Here Comes Sunshine, Beat It On Down The Line, Ship of Fools, Jack Straw, Deal, Promised Land-> Bertha-> Greatest Story Ever Told
key_3.set2: Row Jimmy, Weather Report Suite Prelude-> Weather Report Suite Part 1-> Let It Grow-> Stella Blue, Big River, Ramble On Rose, Me & My Uncle, He's Gone-> Truckin'-> Drums-> The Other One*-> Eyes Of The World, One More Saturday Night, E: Casey Jones, E: Johnny B. Goode**-> E: We Bid You Good Night

key_4.name: Grateful Dead
key_4.set1: U.S. Blues, Mexicali Blues, Brown Eyed Women, Beat It On Down The Line, Candyman, Jack Straw, China Cat Sunflower > I Know You Rider, El Paso, Loser, Playin' In The Band
key_4.set2:
Cumberland Blues, It Must Have Been The Roses, Big River, Bertha, Weather Report Suite Prelude > Weather Report Suite Part 1 > Let It Grow > Row Jimmy > Ship Of Fools, Promised Land, Dark Star > Morning Dew, Sugar Magnolia, Not Fade Away > Going Down The Road Feelin' Bad > Not Fade Away
E: It's All Over Now Baby Blue

key_5.name: Grateful Dead
key_5.set1: Let It Grow, They Love Each Other Let It Grow, They Love Each Other, U. S. Blues #1 -> U. S. Blues #2, Attics Of My Life, It Must Have Been The Roses -> Jam
key_5.comment: Material has been circulated as this date via a 2001 shn set, but is more likely a mislabel of what is really 2/22/74 soundcheck

key_6.name: Grateful Dead
key_6.set1: U.S. Blues, Promised Land, Brown Eyed Women, Mexicali Blues, Tennessee Jed, Black Throated Wind, Scarlet Begonias, Beat It On Down The Line, It Must Have Been The Roses, El Paso, Deal, Cassidy, China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider, Weather Report Suite Prelude-> Weather Report Suite Part 1-> Let It Grow
key_6.set2: Playin' In The Band-> Uncle John's Band-> Morning Dew-> Uncle John's Band-> Playin' In The Band, Ship of Fools, Big River, Ramble On Rose, Me & My Uncle, Bertha, Around & Around, Wharf Rat-> Sugar Magnolia, Casey Jones, E: One More Saturday Night
key_6.comment: material from this date is featured on Dick's Picks 24- go buy it

key_7.name: Grateful Dead
key_7.set1: -Unbroken Chain Instrumental (Reel wow & fluter, Minor distortion) -Scarlet Begonias Instrumental (Drop Out 2:36) -Pride Of Cucamongo Instrumental -Ship Of Fools Instrumental w/ Acoustic -Money Honey Instrumental -Loose Lucy Instrumental -US Blues Instrumental Filler: Early Crazy Fingers 6-3-75 Ace's Mill Valley
key_7.comment: Studio Instumental Roughs From Vault Reel Marked "3-74"

key_8.name: Grateful Dead

key_8.set2: Mississippi Half Step, Truckin'-> Nobody's Fault But Mine-> The Other One-> Heaven Help The Fool Jam-> Row Jimmy, Big River, Ship of Fools, Sugar Magnolia

key_9.name: Grateful Dead

key_9.set1: Bertha, Me & My Uncle, Loser, Black Throated Wind, Scarlet Begonias, It Must Have Been The Roses, Jack Straw, Tennessee Jed, Deal, Big River, Brown Eyed Women, Playin' In The Band

key_49.comment: DSH Show Record Notes: I merged the former xx/xx/74 China-Rider entry to prepare for a shn link, hich needs the ?? format. A former ??/??/74 listing is apparently part of "Dick's Gift", Legion of Mary/Jerry Garcia material, and doesn't really belong in the Grateful Dead listing.
